title: 24k00  General provisions of Secs 13(a)(12) and 13(b)(6) - IB 783.
text:
(a)   Sec 13(a)(12) provides an exemption from
the MW and OT provisions of FLSA for “any employee employed as a seaman on a
vessel other than an American vessel”. (b)   Sec 13(b)(6) provides an exemption from
the OT provisions of FLSA for “any employee employed as a seaman”, including
those on American vessels. (c)   The official WH interpretations of the
scope and meaning of the Secs 13(a)(12) and 13(b)(6) exemptions are contained
in IB 783.
html:
(a)   Sec 13(a)(12) provides an exemption from the MW and OT provisions of FLSA for “any employee employed as a seaman on a vessel other than an American vessel”.

 

(b)   Sec 13(b)(6) provides an exemption from the OT provisions of FLSA for “any employee employed as a seaman”, including those on American vessels.

 

(c)   The official WH interpretations of the scope and meaning of the Secs 13(a)(12) and 13(b)(6) exemptions are contained in IB 783.
